subject: Re: [junit] Is the error cos of Classpath or my Program??
msgSnippet: ... sorry.. that bit about the message should be part of the next comment. [...] ... -- Dave Astels (dave@saorsa.com) Coauthor of A Practical Guide to eXtreme
messageBody:
On Mon, 2002-11-04 at 06:05, Dave Astels wrote:

> Why are you doing this explicitly? TestCase will take care f this for
> you. Also, use the varient that takes a message:

sorry.. that bit about the message should be part of the next comment.

[...]
> Use assertEquals instead, you get much better diagnostics:

--
Dave Astels (dave@...)
